value.name: Claude Skills
observations: Modular folders containing instructions, scripts, and resources that Claude loads when needed
Use three-level progressive loading: metadata (~100 tokens), instructions (<5k tokens), resources (as needed)
Require SKILL.md file with YAML frontmatter containing name and description
Skill names: max 64 chars, lowercase/numbers/hyphens only, no XML tags or reserved words
Four pre-built skills available: Excel (xlsx), PowerPoint (pptx), Word (docx), PDF (pdf)
Can include optional scripts/ and resources/ folders
Are composable, portable, efficient, and powerful
Don't sync across platforms - must upload separately for each
Work differently on Claude.ai vs API vs Claude Code vs Agent SDK

value.name: Skills Architecture
observations: Level 1 (Metadata): YAML frontmatter, always loaded, ~100 tokens per skill
Level 2 (Instructions): SKILL.md body, loaded when triggered, contains workflows and procedures
Level 3 (Resources): Additional files/scripts, loaded only when referenced via bash commands
Progressive disclosure prevents context window overload
Claude automatically identifies when a skill is relevant

value.name: Projects in Dashboard
observations: Contains multiple sub-projects including: google-calendar-clone, jira-wrapper, lastfm-clone, livejournal-clone, react-ts-templates, task-manager
Each project has its own Vite configuration
Projects use different port assignments (documented in PORT_ASSIGNMENTS.md)

observations: Uses calendar categories: personal, work, home, confirmed plans, quests, human things, directions, birthdays, Forever Young (wedding)
Regular healthcare appointments: Van Buren Family Dentistry (17x), Cerebral (12x), ARCannabisClinic (8x)

Recurring tasks: Cat litter (7x), ULTRA timesheet submissions
Concert/event attendance: Glassjaw, Starset, Nothing More, SESSANTA V 2.0
Calendar date range: October 2021 to April 2026
Parents are deceased - has no living family members
All family members mentioned in calendar (Dad, Daddy, Makiah, Amanda) are Patrick's family, not Kayla's
Family context corrected in memory on 2025-11-19
Tracks Patrick's family birthdays in calendar: Dad (Patrick's father), Makiah, Amanda
Refers to Patrick as 'Daddy' (nickname) - calendar has 'Daddy's Birthday' events for Patrick
Engaged to Patrick - wedding date March 21, 2026
Wedding planning tracked in 'Forever Young' calendar (26 events)

STOPPED PATTERNS: Cat care ended September 2024 (9 events in 2024, 0 in 2025), Self-care reminders declined March 2024
